oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Remarks concerning copies of Bushman Paintings, given by Colonel Durnfold to His Excellency Sir Bartle Frere. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-22. 7969-7972, 7974 and 7975, 7983-7993, 23. 7995-8004). The mode of shooting practised by the |núsa Bushmen. By /han≠kass'o (L VIII.-22. 7972-7974). |han≠kass'o identifies and describes various groups of people (as they appear in a copy of rock painting no. 2). 1) |han≠kass'o has not observed the '|nu'sa Bushmen' (or |nu'ssaiten) himself, 2) p.7973v: words and sentences, 3) See also Notes on rock painting copy no. 3 and Notes on rock painting copy no. 5, no. 6. and no. 7, 4) This story is found in Book VIII-22.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notes on rock painting copy no. 2 (!nu'sa and other groups)
